sentence.Network_en: Their voracity is legendary and even the most hardened warriors cannot repress a shiver if one speaks about them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的贪食是传奇性的,甚至强壮的战士也会因为提起他们而无法抑制的颤抖.

sentence.Network_en: He ate with the voracity of a starving man.
sentence.Network_cn: 他饿鬼似的贪婪地吃着.

sentence.Network_en: It's a kind of social curiosity, an intellectual voracity.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一种对社会的好奇心, 一种知识上的贪娈.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 体质圣契怎么用？_爱问知识人 ... Protection 保护 Voracity 贪婪 Constitution 体质.
词根及词缀 ... voracious a 狼吞虎咽的 voracity n 贪食 devour v 吞吃.

auth_sentence.content: The Strand's most distinctive characteristic is its lupine voracity.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Strand's most distinctive characteristic is its lupine voracity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Strand's most distinctive characteristic is its lupine voracity.

auth_sentence.content: Just because I do not have the time to attempt to publish in a peer reviewed journal does not reduce the voracity of my findings.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just because I do not have the time to attempt to publish in a peer reviewed journal does not reduce the voracity of my findings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just because I do not have the time to attempt to publish in a peer reviewed journal does not reduce the voracity of my findings.

auth_sentence.content: Not the voracity of the logic per se, but the apparent scope of your understanding.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not the voracity of the logic per se, but the apparent scope of your understanding.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not the voracity of the logic per se, but the apparent scope of your understanding.
